name: Overcooked! Online
description: A 6-player online game based on Overcooked 2 by Team17 at Ghost Town Games where you race around the kitchen scrambling to prepare orders in time. Each player has an extended food-handler's permit allowing them to leave anything they want on the floor and throw food, knives, pots, dishes, etc. This project is designed to test client-to-client websocket connections and compatibility for mobile devices.
